data.name: AboutBroadcaster_AcknowledgementsFullText
data.value: Acknowledgements: XSplit BROADCASTER is based on the original source code of Multicam Studio, a product developed by Vladimir Hmelyoff and Egor Hmelyoff. Portions of this program use open source software libraries, please refer to the general license terms and details here.

data.name: AboutBroadcaster_LicenseLinkText
data.value: general license terms and details here

data.name: addMoreTsmi2
data.value: Get more plugins from the plugin store

data.name: AskToRetrySync
data.value: Unable to synchronize your profile with the server.

data.name: BwTester_Init0
data.value: Trying to stream maximum data rate of {0} kbps...

data.name: BwTester_Init01
data.value: Attempting to stream at {0} kbps to {1}

data.name: BwTester_RedOffer
data.value: You can redo the test, but if the test consistently gives you a RED signal, you may consider lowering your combined audio bitrate and max video bitrate{0}.

data.name: BwTester_Sending
data.value: Achieved data rate during {1:0} ms: {0} kbps...

data.name: BwTester_ResultLegend
data.value: Results legend: Green: The target bitrate was achieved and no frame was dropped Yellow: The target bitrate was not achieved for all measurements. You should lower the bitrate and retry. Red: Frame drops were present. You should not use this target bitrate.

data.name: BwTester_YellowOffer
data.value: If the test consistently gives you a YELLOW signal, you may consider lowering your combined audio bitrate and max video bitrate{0}.

data.name: cboMaxBitrate_Tooltip
data.value: Set to the maximum bitrate you wish to stream

data.name: cboQuality_Tooltip
data.value: Quality: 0 - Worst quality low bandwith (CRF = 35) Quality: 10 - Best quality high bandwith (CRF = 25)

data.name: chkEnableGameSource_Tooltip
data.value: Game Source can be used to capture a game in fullscreen mode.

data.name: chkLogSysInfo_Tooltip
data.value: Logs system information to XSplit server. Information includes OS, processor, video card, screen resolution.

data.name: chkRecordStream
data.value: Automatically save recording on local drive

data.name: chkSkipIntro
data.value: Don't show me this window again.

data.name: ConfirmCreationOfNonExistingFolder
data.value: "{0}" does not exist. Do you want to create it?

data.name: InvalidChannelCredentials
data.value: A problem occured while authenticating your credentials. Please check that your username and password are correct and your network connection is okay.

data.name: label1BroadcastShare
data.value: You are now live streaming to {0}. Click here to open a browser to view the stream (remember to mute the stream to avoid audio loop back).

data.name: label1BroadcastShare1
data.value: You are now live streaming to {0}.

data.name: label1BroadcastShare2
data.value: A recording has been started. Your recorded files can be accessed from the File menu -> My Recordings.

data.name: label1BroadcastShare3
data.value: You are now recording the Active Scene. Recorded files can be accessed from the File menu -> My Recordings.

data.name: label1BroadcastShare4
data.value: You are now recording {0}. Recorded files can be accessed from the File menu -> My Recordings.

data.name: label4
data.value: Using this feature, you can edit your channel status even while in mid-broadcast.

data.name: lblBufferSize_Tooltip
data.value: Max bitrate is relative to this buffer. Buffer should not be bigger than subscribers buffer. (Usually livestreaming services set buffer to 2 seconds if there are no low latency requirements.)

data.name: lblCamDSHint
data.value: To configure your {0} settings, click on the button below.

data.name: lblCuePointsHint
data.value: Enter the cue points, separated by comma, you want to use in the text box below. Use the format: hh:mm:ss

data.name: lblFramerate_Tooltip
data.value: Setting Frames per second higher than 15 can result in exhaustive CPU usage and large bandwidth requirement.

data.name: lblInternal2
data.value: If you have a membership with Twitch, Ustream or another online service, you can add one or more channels for each service which supports open streaming via RTMP or RTMPT.

data.name: lblLink_Tooltip
data.value: This is the URL where your stream can be viewed by other users. When the stream starts, this link is automatically copied to clipboard.

data.name: lblMaxBitrate_Tooltip
data.value: Set to the maximum bitrate you wish to stream

data.name: lblName_Tooltip
data.value: Name assigned to this channel for easy identification.

data.name: lblPos3DHint
data.value: To rotate your source, hold Shift while dragging your mouse

data.name: lblQuality_Tooltip
data.value: Quality: 0 - Worst quality low bandwith (CRF = 35) Quality: 10 - Best quality high bandwith (CRF = 25)

data.name: lblScrCapOptiTextResizeHint
data.value: (Uncheck this for better performance) (Works only when source occupies full stage)

data.name: lblTitleHint
data.value: To configure your Title source, click on the button below.

data.name: lnkBandwidthTesterGuide
data.value: See how the bandwidth tester works.

data.name: MakeXSplitLayeredWindowWarning
data.value:
Making XSplit a layered window can reduce screen capture performance when XSplit is not minimized to the taskbar.
Continue making XSplit a layered window?

data.name: msgAbortPluginInstall
data.value: Plugin installation is still in progress. If you press OK before download is completed, plugin installation will be aborted.

data.name: msgAddGameNotice
data.value: Before you can capture a game or a media player, you first need to click inside the window you wish to capture. So click first your game and then go back and choose this menu item.

data.name: msgAddGameNoticeGsDisabled
data.value: Before you can capture a game or a media player, you first need to enable GameSource from Tools > General settings menu and then click inside the window you wish to capture. So enable GameSource, click your game, and then come back and choose this menu item.

data.name: msgAddinInstallationFailed_ArgumentError
data.value: Unable to install due to problem with installation parameters. Please try again or contact XSplit Support.

data.name: msgAddinInstallationFailed_InstallFailed
data.value: Installation ended prematurely. Please restart XSplit to avoid unwanted behavior.

data.name: msgAddinInstallationFailed_InstallFileNotFound
data.value: Unable to install due to missing installation files. Please try again or contact XSplit Support.

data.name: msgAddinInstallationFailed_InstallHashCheckFailed
data.value: Unable to install due to mismatched file hash. Please try again or contact XSplit Support.

data.name: msgAddinInstallationFailed_Unknown
data.value: Installation ended prematurely. Please restart XSplit to avoid unwanted behavior.

data.name: msgAddinInstallerIsBusy_Text
data.value: Another plugin installation is in-progress. Please try again later.

data.name: msgAddinInstallSucceeded
data.value:
Done. Please restart XSplit for changes to take effect.
XSplit will now close.

data.name: msgAddinInstallSucceeded1
data.value: Done. Please restart XSplit for changes to take effect.

data.name: msgAddinInstallSucceeded2
data.value:
Successfully installed plugin(s). Please restart XSplit for changes to take effect.
XSplit will now close.

data.name: msgAddinInstallSucceeded3
data.value:
Successfully installed plugin(s). XSplit needs to restart for changes to take effect.
Restart now?

data.name: msgAddinInstallSucceeded4
data.value:
Done. XSplit needs to restart for changes to take effect.
Restart now?

data.name: msgAddinInstallSucceeded5
data.value: Successfully installed plugin(s). XSplit needs to restart for changes to take effect.

data.name: msgAddinUinstallationFailed
data.value: Uninstall ended prematurely. Please restart XSplit to avoid unwanted behavior.

data.name: msgAddinUinstallationFailed_ArgumentError
data.value: Unable to uninstall due to problem with installation parameters. Please try again or contact XSplit Support.

data.name: msgAddinUinstallationFailed_UninstallFailed
data.value: Uninstall ended prematurely. Please restart XSplit to avoid unwanted behavior.

data.name: msgAddinUinstallationFailed_Unknown
data.value: Uninstall ended prematurely. Please restart XSplit to avoid unwanted behavior.

data.name: msgAddinUninstallConfirm_Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to uninstall "{0}"?

data.name: msgCantCreateRecordingOutDir
data.value: Can't create recording directory '{0}'. Try creating it yourself and try recording again.

data.name: msgCantEditActiveStream
data.value: You cannot edit settings while streaming.

data.name: msgCantEditActiveStreamAdaptiveBr
data.value: You cannot edit settings while streaming with 'Adaptive CBR'

data.name: msgCantEditActiveStreamCbr
data.value: You cannot edit settings while streaming in strict CBR mode.

data.name: msgCantEditActiveRecording
data.value: You cannot edit settings while recording locally.

data.name: msgCantEditActiveRecordingCbr
data.value: You cannot edit settings while recording locally in strict CBR mode.

data.name: msgCantEditChannelOfMissingAddin
data.value: The {0} plugin is not available on this machine. Try installing the plugin from the store by clicking Add > More...

data.name: msgCantRemoveActiveStream
data.value: You cannot remove channel while streaming.

data.name: msgCurrentResolutionIsNotSupported
data.value: XSplit does not support stage resolutions greater than 1920 x 1080 for XP systems. These resolutions will not be available in Resolutions menu. XSplit will now revert your stage resolution to default.

data.name: msgCurrentResolutionIsNotSupported1
data.value: XSplit does not support stage resolutions greater than 1920 x 1080 for XP systems. These resolutions will not be available in Resolutions menu.

data.name: msgCurrentResolutionIsNotSupported3
data.value: XSplit does not support stage resolutions lower than {0:N0} pixels.

data.name: msgDefaultStageResolutionWarning
data.value:
By setting a lower resolution and/or frame rate than your current stage resolution and/or frame rate, it's possible to encode multiple streams at the same time with different resolutions and/or frame rates.
Hence, you can have a stream or local recording set up to use the current stage resolution/frame rate and then set up another stream, forcing lower resolution and/or frame rate than the default.
This setting is not preserved on your account and needs to be set on every login.

data.name: msgEnableAeroWarning
data.value:
On Windows 7 and Vista, layered window will always be captured when Aero theme is enabled. Not allowing XSplit to disable Aero theme may result in some screen capture source options not having the expected effect.
Continue?

data.name: msgEnableD3D
data.value: Your PC hardware does not meet the minimum graphics hardware [requirements](https://xspl.it/bc/req), please contact [support](https://xspl.it/support) for more information.

data.name: msgEnableVcamCheckedChangedHint
data.value: Please note that virtual camera is automatically disabled during broadcast.

data.name: msgFailedGettingRtmp_HowUserAffected
data.value: Streaming site may be down or has a problem.

data.name: msgFailedGettingRtmp_WhatUserCanDo
data.value: Try again later, contact the streaming provider, or contact {0}

data.name: msgFailedLoadingAddinStore
data.value: Failed loading plugin store. Please try again later.

data.name: msgFailureLoadinAddin_HowUserAffected
data.value: Streams added using this plugin may not be available.

data.name: msgFlashAxFailure
data.value: Failed working with Flash Player for Windows Internet Explorer: {0}

data.name: msgFlashAxIsOld
data.value:
XSplit has detected that you are using an old version of Flash Player for Internet Explorer.
XSplit requires at least version 10.3.181 of Flash Player for Internet Explorer to be installed. Failure to install the latest version of Flash Player for Internet Explorer can result in unexpected behavior.
Would you like to get the latest version of Flash Player for Internet Explorer now?

data.name: msgFlashAxIsRequired
data.value:
XSplit has detected that Flash Player for Internet Explorer is not installed.
XSplit requires at least version 10.3.181 of Flash Player for Internet Explorer to be installed. Failure to install the latest version of Flash Player for Internet Explorer can result in unexpected behavior.
Would you like to get the latest version of Flash Player for Internet Explorer now?

data.name: msgFlashAxNotInstalled
data.value: Flash Player for Windows Internet Explorer is required for this feature to work.

data.name: msgForcedUpdate
data.value:
This version {0} has expired. A new version {1} of XSplit Broadcaster is available. You will now be required to update to the new version.
If for any reason the upgrade should fail or if you have problems using XSplit after the automatic upgrade then please uninstall XSplit and reinstall XSplit by downloading the latest release from [www.xsplit.com](http://www.xsplit.com)

data.name: msgFramerateDefined
data.value: Framerate is already available in the menu

data.value: The following hotkeys failed to register.

The following hotkeys cannot be assigned with the same keys.

You are currently in Basic hotkey mode. The following hotkeys can only be assigned in combination with modifier keys (Control, Shift, Alt).

data.value:
You are currently in Basic hotkey mode. The following hotkeys can only be assigned in Advanced mode.

data.name: msgLoginValidation2
data.value: Please do not leave your password blank.

data.name: msgMaxFps
data.value: Maximum allowable frame rate is {0} FPS.

data.name: msgOptionalUpdate
data.value:
A new version {0} of XSplit Broadcaster is available. Unless the SplitMediaLabs team finds significant defects in this new upgrade, all users will be required to update on or before {1}.
If you choose to install the current update now, you can always revert to the older version of XSplit Broadcaster by uninstalling and installing the official downloadable version available on [www.xsplit.com](http://www.xsplit.com).
If for any reason the upgrade should fail or if you have problems using XSplit after the upgrade then please uninstall XSplit and reinstall XSplit by downloading the latest release from [www.xsplit.com](http://www.xsplit.com)

data.name: msgOptionalUpdate2
data.value:
A new version {0} of XSplit Broadcaster is available.
If you choose to install the current update now, you can always revert to the older version of XSplit Broadcaster by uninstalling and installing the official downloadable version available on [www.xsplit.com](http://www.xsplit.com).
If for any reason the upgrade should fail or if you have problems using XSplit after the upgrade then please uninstall XSplit and reinstall XSplit by downloading the latest release from [www.xsplit.com](http://www.xsplit.com)

data.value: Do you want to save changes before closing this dialog?

An email with an activation link has been sent to your email account. You will need to activate your XSplit account in order to sign in.

data.name: msgServerAuthenticateFailed_90027
data.value:
XSplit was unable to validate you as a registered user. If you have previously registered with 321meet.com, please [re-register](https://xspl.it/register) your account on XSplit website.
Hereafter your XSplit and 321meet account can share and use the same credentials.

You have set your stream's output resolution to {0} x {1}. It is not recommended to stream live over the internet with any resolution higher than 1280 x 720.

data.value: You have set your stream's output resolution to {0} x {1}. It is not recommended to stream live over the internet with any resolution higher than 1280 x 720.

data.value: You have selected to record/stream with a resolution which is larger than the current stage resolution. Your video will not be scaled but only padded.

data.name: msgSyncFailure
data.value: Failure encountered synchronizing your settings with the server. Your internet connection may be offline.

data.value: Please help us know and resolve this issue by sending this info to us.

data.name: spMessage
data.value: XSplit did not shut down properly the last time it was used. This may be caused by various issues listed in this link which may include unstable sources or program errors. If you wish to report a bug, click here.

data.name: XSplitNetIsNotAllowed
data.value:
The MultiStream service allows restreaming to multiple destinations from one stream. With this service, it's also possible to connect streams between Broadcasters.
Please contact SplitMediaLabs to find out how you can utilize the MultiStream service.

data.name: XSplitNetNonPremiumNotice
data.value: The MultiStream service is currently only available to those who pre-ordered a Premium License. To pre-order a Premium License, click OK.

data.name: msgRecordingFileTypeLicenseOffer
data.value:
{0} recording file type is only available for licensed users.
Would you like to purchase a license now?

data.name: msgMaxAllowedResLicenseOffer
data.value:
Resolutions greater than {0} is watermarked for non-licensed users.
Would you like to purchase a license now?

data.name: msgMaxAllowedFpsLicenseOffer
data.value:
Frame rates greater than {0} FPS is only available for licensed users.

The demo version of XSplit does not provide streaming to multiple channels at the same time.

data.value: Max Bitrate must not be lower than {0} kbps.

data.value: Bitrate must not be lower than {0} kbps.

data.value:
XSplit requires Microsoft .NET Framework {0} to run.
Would you like to download and install Microsoft .NET Framework {0} now?

data.name: servermessage_dlogdesc
data.value: Your account is currently logged into another computer. If you still wish to log in, please re-enter your credentials. Take note that this action will log out your account in the other computer which will stop any streams currently running on it.

data.name: servermessage_fdisdesc
data.value: Your account has been logged into another machine. This client has been logged out since your license only allows one machine to be logged in at any given time. If you wish to log in again, please re-enter your credentials. Take note that this action will log out your account in the other computer which will stop any streams currently running on it.

data.name: msgLocalLoginFailed
data.value: Unable to authenticate user. Please send {0} to support@xsplit.com for analysis.

data.name: msgProjectorBuyPremiumOffer
data.value: This feature requires a premium license. Click OK to get a premium license.

data.name: FailureSettingDirectoryAcl
data.value: Unable to set required permissions to folder {0}. {1}

data.name: msgEasyCropPreReqPrompt
data.value: Quick crop currently needs to set the stage scale to Actual size then set back to preferred scale afterwards. Do you want to proceed?

data.name: msgInternalServerBuyPremiumOffer
data.value: This feature requires a premium license. Click OK to get a premium license.

data.name: growlFramerateAndResIsHighForWei
data.value: Your system may not be capable of smoothly streaming or recording in {0} at {1:N2} fps.

data.name: msgAddSkypeVideoSourceNotice
data.value: Before you can capture Skype video source, you first need to click inside Skype's video call window. So click first Skype's video call window and then go back and choose this menu item.

data.name: msgAddSkypeVideoSourceNoticeGsDisabled
data.value: Before you can capture Skype video source, you first need to enable GameSource from Tools > General settings menu and then click inside Skype's video call window. So enable GameSource, click Skype's video call window, and then go back and choose this menu item.

data.name: rtfSkypeHint
data.value:
Skype's Call Monitor window may cause the video item to flicker. To avoid this, you can disable the Call Monitor in Skype:
1. Go to Tools > Options 2. Go to Calls > Call settings 3. Click "Show advanced options" button 4. Uncheck "Show call controls when Skype is in the background"

data.name: faster_Tooltip
data.value: Medium compression, Medium CPU usage (DON'T TRY WITHOUT i7)

data.name: fast_Tooltip
data.value: Medium-high compression Medium-high CPU usage (DON'T TRY WITHOUT 2GEN i7)

data.name: medium_Tooltip
data.value: High compression High CPU usage (DON'T TRY WITHOUT 2GEN FAST i7)

data.name: slow_Tooltip
data.value: Very high compression Very high CPU usage (DON'T TRY WITHOUT MONSTER CPU)

data.name: superfast_Tooltip
data.value: Lowest compression Lowest CPU usage (RECOMMENDED FOR SMALL CPU)

data.name: veryfast_Tooltip
data.value: Reasonable compression Low CPU usage (RECOMMENDED FOR MOST USERS)

data.name: lblMaxFileSize_Tooltip
data.value: Maximum size of recording per segment (e.g. 5120 kB, 5 MB, 2 GB). Specify zero (0) to keep a single file (may cause file write issues on large MP4 recordings). If unit is not specified, input is assumed to be in bytes.

data.name: msgInvalidMaxRecordingFileSize
data.value: Invalid Max. MP4 file size specified.

data.name: txtMaxFileSize_Tooltip
data.value: Maximum size of recording per segment (e.g. 5120 kB, 5 MB, 2 GB). Specify zero (0) to keep a single file (may cause file write issues on large MP4 recordings). If unit is not specified, input is assumed to be in bytes.

data.name: msgBroadcastTerminated
data.value: Your {0} broadcast was terminated. Please check your channel settings and confirm that you can stream by clicking the "{1}" button. Click here to learn more.

data.name: lblGameImageHint
data.value: The offline image will be shown if the game or source is not detected (leave it empty to make GameSource transparent)

data.name: lblSkypeImageHint
data.value: The offline image will be shown if a Skype video feed is not detected (leave it empty to make the Skype source transparent)

data.name: msgAddSkypeNoticeGsDisabled
data.value: Skype video source requires GameSource function enabled to work. So enable GameSource from Tools > General settings menu and then come back and choose this menu item.

data.name: msgInternetExplorerIsRequired
data.value:
XSplit has detected that Internet Explorer is not installed.
XSplit requires at least version 7 of Internet Explorer to work properly.
Would you like to get the latest version of Internet Explorer now?

data.name: msgInternetExplorerIsOld
data.value:
XSplit has detected that you are using an old version of Internet Explorer.
XSplit requires at least version 7 of Internet Explorer to work properly.
Would you like to get the latest version of Internet Explorer now?

data.name: msgAmdRadeonHd7xxxWarning
data.value: XSplit has detected that you are using an AMD Radeon HD 7xxx series graphics card which currently may have issues with XSplit. Please click here for more information. Don't show me this again.

data.name: msgDefaultStageResolutionWarning AVerMedia H.264 Encoder
data.value: Resolution and/or frame rate setting are not preserved on your account and need to be set on every login.

data.name: msgLicenseOffer_libh264aver
data.value:
With AVerMedia C985 Live Gamer capture card installed in your workstation, it is now possible for XSplit to make use of the built in hardware encoder. This feature is only available for premium license users. Please consider upgrading your current license to a premium license.
Upgrade your license now?

data.name: msgLicenseOffer_libh264aver1
data.value: Your license does not permit the usage of {0} capture card's built in encoder. XSplit will now switch to the default {1} encoder.

data.name: msgNoNetNoLocal
data.value: XSplit did not detect an internet connection. You need to be connected to the internet while logging in for the first time on this computer.

data.name: msgMaintModeHasLocal
data.value: {0} XSplit will proceed to log in in offline mode which will allow you to use most functions not requiring a direct XSplit server connection.

data.name: msgMaintModeNoLocal
data.value: {0} Connection to XSplit servers is required while logging in for the first time on this computer. Please try again later.

data.name: msgMaintMode

data.name: msgFinalizingRecordings
data.value:
Your recent recordings are still being finalized. This process may take several minutes depending on file size.
Aborting this process now will still make your recordings playable on your media player software but may have to be post-processed before uploading to video sites.
Do you want to abort finalization now?

data.name: msgResponseProcessingFailedHasLocal
data.value:
XSplit was unable to log you in.
The error has been logged into {0}.
If this problem persists, please contact support@xsplit.com and attach the log file.
XSplit will proceed to log in in offline mode which will allow you to use most functions.

data.name: msgResponseProcessingFailedNoLocal
data.value:
XSplit was unable to log you in.
The error has been logged into {0}.
If this problem persists, please contact support@xsplit.com and attach the log file.

data.name: growlMinAvailMemWarning

data.name: growlDesktopCaptureOnAeroWarning

data.name: msgStreamingUnsupportedVideoCodec2Confirm

data.name: msgXSplitCertErrorEncountered
data.value: XSplit detected a certificate related error which indicates an insecure connection between XSplit and online services. This may also prevent you from authenticating or communicating with third party service providers like Twitch/YouTube/Facebook. In some cases this could be a result of malware installed on your computer, which could be used for so called man-in-the-middle attacks (MitM). Please click on [this blog post](https://xspl.it/www/ngwv7e) to learn more.[br][br]If you choose to ignore this warning it will be remembered for this session AT YOUR OWN RISK. Close down XSplit now?

data.value: No internet connection detected. You need an internet connection to log in

data.name: msgRetryTokenLoginValidLocal
data.value: Unable to login using your saved information. You may proceed to offline mode which will allow you to use most functions not requiring a direct XSplit server connection, or retry to use saved information again.

data.name: msgRetryTokenLoginInvalidLocal
data.value: Unable to login using your saved information. You may proceed to re-login using your credentials, or retry to use saved information again

data.name: msgAutoLoginUserDiffer
data.value: You have logged in to a different account from another XSplit application. Do you want to continue as **{0}**?

data.name: PropertyIds.IDC_BUTTON_PRESETLIST
data.value: Add, remove presets and set transition

data.name: PropertyIds.IDC_CHECK_PRESET2
data.value:
Go to Preset 2.
Drag the preset icons to reorder

data.name: PropertyIds.IDC_CHECK_PRESET3
data.value:
Go to Preset 3.
Drag the preset icons to reorder

data.name: PropertyIds.IDC_CHECK_PRESET4
data.value:
Go to Preset 4.
Drag the preset icons to reorder

data.name: tsmiScenePresetTransitionTimeDialogHeader
data.value: Set the transition speed when switching between presets. This will animate properties such as rotation, scaling, cropping and more.

data.name: tsmiScenePresetRemoveDD_Tooltip
data.value: Presets will automatically be renamed to follow the number sequence.

data.name: msgNoNetHasLocalLoginPopup
data.value: XSplit did not detect an internet connection. You may still be able to log in but some functions requiring internet connection may not work, or retry to connect online again

data.name: invalidBpzipMessage
data.value: Unable to load your zipped presentation file. The file may be invalid or does not contain a broadcaster presentation file (.bpres).

data.name: overwriteBpresFolderMessage
data.value:
The folder **'{0}'** already exists in the destination folder.
Would you like to overwrite the folder and its files, and continue to load the presentation?

data.name: ioExceptionMessageWithBpzipExtraction
data.value:
Unable to extract and overwrite some files. One or more files may be in use.
Close the file and try to load the presentation again.

data.name: msgConfirmDeleteTransitionInUse
data.value: This transition is currently in use. Are you sure you want to remove it?

data.name: msgOverMaxBitrate
data.value: Your viewers' experience or stream quality may be negatively affected when setting a bitrate above the recommended maximum of {0} kbps.

data.name: localRecordAddToolStripMenuItem
data.value: Set up a new recording output

data.name: msgCantEditActiveNdiOutput
data.value: You cannot edit settings while playout is active.
